title.full: Cabelas Big Game Hunter  Pro Hunts

description.full: The Games on Demand version supports English.  Hunt with the pros!  * Bring home bigger game faster using advice from our pros, including  Wade Middleton, Jim Shockey, and Ralph & Vicki Cianciarulo. * The most authentic hunting ballistics ever in a cabela's(R) game! * Traverse maps 4x the size of any previous Cabela's(R) Big Game Hunter(R) game! * Track, scout and target your trophy animal in all new ways!
description.short: Hunt with the pros!  * Bring home bigger game faster using advice from our pros, including Wade Middleton, Jim Shockey, and Ralph & Vicki Cianciarulo. * The most authentic hunting ballistics ever in a cabela's(R) game! * Traverse maps 4x the size of any previous Cabela's(R) Big Game Hunter(R) game! * Track, scout and target your trophy animal in all new ways!
